item.description:
For people who around chinatown, and dont want to have lunch alone. Interested in Chinese Cultural,and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English, and enjoy lunch with us. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community.

We look forward to seeing you there! We gonna be there from 12:00 pm to 1:30pm

I wont be there if nobody RSVP yes.

I will only wait 15 mins past the hour before ordering my food.

Take T to chinatown or boylston station.


more info.
http://www.yelp.com/b...

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch In Chinatown(Pho Pasteur)
